titleStmt.title: J. K. Edwards to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1183

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1863-1867

body.p:
Hd Qrts Ky Scouts
Owingsville Ky Apl 11th 1864
Gov Bramlette

Mr. Robt E. Finnell the only state Policeman I have still employed, has sent to me his report for the month ending Apl 7th/64 his wages are $50 pr month. I kept him because I thought it nesesary to have one officer there & in the vicinity of Frankfort, you will please pay him his months wages & take his receipt therefor as he is a very poor man

Respectfully your obt servt
J K Edwards
Chief Secret service
